text:
We're looking for Django developers.

Remote work is fine, but Providence, RI area is preferable (or, a willingness to consider relocation eventually; though to be clear, for the right person this isn't a requirement at all).

We're a small design driven development company working exclusively on Django projects. Very flexible work environment, bonus options, etc. We are not a funded startup, we're bootstrapping ourselves. We have a large fluffy dog as the office mascot!

Must enjoy, or tolerate, a wide variety of musical genres and styles.

Email peter at projectevolution.com if you're interested!
